languages.text: "В другой жизни ты могла бы носить знаки Сороритас, и я звала бы тебя сестрой. Но твои ритуалы... тревожат меня".
"In another life, you could have worn the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."
languages.original_text: "В другой жизни ты могла бы носить знаки Сороритас, и я звала бы тебя сестрой. Но твои ритуалы... тревожат меня".

traits.locale_text: "In another life, you could have been wearing the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals, they... trouble me."
"In another life, you could have been wearing the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals, they... trouble me."
"In another life, you could have been wearing the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."
"In another life, you could have been wearing the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."

"In another life, you could have worn the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."
"In another life, you could have worn the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."

languages.text: "In einem anderen Leben hättet Ihr die Insignien der Adepta Sororitas tragen können und ich hätte Euch Schwester genannt. Doch Eure Rituale ... beunruhigen mich."
languages.original_text: "In another life, you could have worn the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."

traits.locale_text: "In einem anderen Leben hättet Ihr die Insignien der Adepta Sororitas tragen können und ich hätte Euch Schwester genannt. Doch Eure Rituale ... beunruhigen mich."

languages.text: « Dans une autre vie, vous auriez pu porter l'insigne de l'Adepta Sororitas, et je vous aurais appelée sœur. Mais vos rituels... vos rituels me troublent. »
languages.original_text: "In another life, you could have worn the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."

traits.locale_text: « Dans une autre vie, vous auriez pu porter l'insigne de l'Adepta Sororitas, et je vous aurais appelée sœur. Mais vos rituels... vos rituels me troublent. »

languages.text: «En otra vida, podría haber llevado la insignia del Adepta Sororitas y la hubiera considerado mi hermana. Pero sus rituales me... preocupan».
languages.original_text: "In another life, you could have worn the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."

traits.locale_text: «En otra vida, podría haber llevado la insignia del Adepta Sororitas y la hubiera considerado mi hermana. Pero sus rituales me... preocupan».

languages.text: 「別の人生では、修道聖女会の記章をつけていたかもしれない。そして、あなたをシスターと呼んでいたでしょう。でも、あなたの儀式は…私を悩ませる」
languages.original_text: "In another life, you could have worn the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."

traits.locale_text: 「別の人生では、修道聖女会の記章をつけていたかもしれない。そして、あなたをシスターと呼んでいたでしょう。でも、あなたの儀式は…私を悩ませる」

languages.text: “若是你能过上另一种人生，你可能会戴上修女会的徽章，我说不定也会与你以姐妹相称。不过你的那些仪式，让我感觉……很困扰。”
languages.original_text: "In another life, you could have worn the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."

traits.locale_text: “若是你能过上另一种人生，你可能会戴上修女会的徽章，我说不定也会与你以姐妹相称。不过你的那些仪式，让我感觉……很困扰。”

languages.original_text: "In another life, you could have worn the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."

languages.text: "Başka bir hayatta Adepta Sororitas nişanını taşıyabilirdin, sana kız kardeşim derdim. Ama gerçekleştirdiğin o ayinler... Beni huzursuz ediyor."
languages.original_text: "In another life, you could have worn the insignia of the Adepta Sororitas, and I would have called you sister. But your rituals — they... trouble me."
